feed.subtitle: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from glazeruns

entry.title: Suicide & Crisis Lifeline - 988 The national suicide hotline. Not first responder specific, but they can talk to anyone who needs help. Safe Call Now - 1-206-459-3020 A 24/7 help line staffed by first responders for first responders and their family membe
entry.content: Suicide & Crisis Lifeline - 988 The national suicide hotline. Not first responder specific, but they can talk to anyone who needs help. Safe Call Now - 1-206-459-3020 A 24/7 help line staffed by first responders for first responders and their family membe

entry.title: Special Trail Talk edition this week. Welcome to the show. I made a quick video for this week's Trail Talk show and was roasted by the panel. I have thick skin. Let's see if they do. Seems the elite gatekeepers are upset that I did something I thought wou

entry.title: This is what my runner's highs look like. 240 miles into Cocodona 250. This was day 7 of my 350-mile CocoCanyons adventure. I had run 340 miles and climbed 55,000 feet at this point. 10 more miles, and it would all be over. I was stripped bare. What a bea
entry.content: This is what my runner's highs look like. 240 miles into Cocodona 250. This was day 7 of my 350-mile CocoCanyons adventure. I had run 340 miles and climbed 55,000 feet at this point. 10 more miles, and it would all be over. I was stripped bare. What a bea

entry.title: Happy Easter from the Glaze Family. Station visits from the family are always the best. Part of being a firefighter is missing a lot of holidays, birthdays, and milestones. But we make it work. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #firefighter
entry.content: Happy Easter from the Glaze Family. Station visits from the family are always the best. Part of being a firefighter is missing a lot of holidays, birthdays, and milestones. But we make it work. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #firefighter

entry.title: It was such a fun month watching firefighters from all over the world running fire station loops. I hope you challenged yourself and possibly found that running is fun and a great way to destress. Please let me know how many miles you ran. Don't worry if
entry.content: It was such a fun month watching firefighters from all over the world running fire station loops. I hope you challenged yourself and possibly found that running is fun and a great way to destress. Please let me know how many miles you ran. Don't worry if

entry.title: Thanks for all the support over the past 4 years. Over 30,000 miles run. So many highs and lows. But all good things must come to an end. Happy April Fools Day. #runtok #runstreak #ultrarunner
entry.content: Thanks for all the support over the past 4 years. Over 30,000 miles run. So many highs and lows. But all good things must come to an end. Happy April Fools Day. #runtok #runstreak #ultrarunner

entry.title: Pulled off the win although I had to really work for it. 100 miles/161 km does not come easily. Especially when the race starts at 6pm. Born to Run 100 miler was an incredible experience and I will be back. #runtok #ultramarathon #ultrarunner #borntorun
entry.content: Pulled off the win although I had to really work for it. 100 miles/161 km does not come easily. Especially when the race starts at 6pm. Born to Run 100 miler was an incredible experience and I will be back. #runtok #ultramarathon #ultrarunner #borntorun
